title: Short-Intensive Course in Social Studies Utilizing Adaptive Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental social science principles
context.additional_context: Blended learning course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments to strengthen social studies job competencies

learning_goals: Students can explain core concepts in social studies with over 90% accuracy using ALP
Students can achieve a 15% or greater improvement in assessment scores by utilizing ALP in blended learning environments

Using the ALP (Active Learning Plan) tool, learners analyze formative assessment results (twice weekly) over one week to identify learning gaps, establish a self-directed learning plan (time allocation, goal setting, resource utilization), and achieve over 80% target completion in summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
